title: Milei-style flamethrowers and ‘racist bigotry’: The candidate for Missouri governor who promises to send back migrants
summary: Republican Senator Bill Eigel, who is seeking his party’s nomination in the state primaries, used a Hispanic man in a controversial ad to present his proposals to conservative voters
